name: Manus-Bond 77AM
description: Manus-Bond 77AM Modified Polyurethane Sealant/Adhesive is based on silylated prepolymer. This "hybrid" system overcomes the limitations of typical polyurethanes without sacrificing performance. 77AM is solvent-free, non-isocyanate and is non-yellowing. 77AM offers superior primerless adhesion to a large variety of substrates and has excellent paintability. Exhibits low dirt pick-up, fast cure and is non-staining on porous surfaces. 77AM has excellent UV resistance and is highly durable in the harshest environments, including chemical resistance to jet fuels and road salts.
